entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
